data.lyric:
[ti:Who's In Your Head]
[ar:Jonas Brothers]
[al:Who's In Your Head]
[by:]

[00:00.33]Who's In Your Head - Jonas Brothers
[00:01.63]Lyrics by：ILYA/Max Martin/David Stewart/Rami Yacoub/Nick Jonas/Joe Jonas/Kevin Jonas
[00:04.79]Composed by：ILYA/Max Martin/David Stewart/Rami Yacoub/Nick Jonas/Joe Jonas/Kevin Jonas
[00:07.93]
[00:12.66]You moved like magic you moved like time
[00:16.33]
[00:17.38]You had your heart disguised
[00:20.18]
[00:22.05]When you cry diamonds yeah they shine
[00:25.98]
[00:27.04]But they blind my eyes and now
[00:31.04]I hear the whispers every night
[00:33.52]Even when I'm dreamin'
[00:35.29]
[00:35.86]Now tell me baby would you ever mind
[00:40.18]I wanna know who's in your head
[00:42.39]
[00:42.98]Stealin' your heart while I'm still bleedin'
[00:45.47]Who's in your bed
[00:47.13]
[00:47.79]Wrapped in your arms while I ain't sleepin'
[00:50.56]Got lost in your halo
[00:51.99]Halo
[00:52.89]I just wanna know
[00:54.87]Know who's in your head in your head
[00:57.77]
[00:59.08]I wanna know who's in your head in your head
[01:02.44]
[01:04.99]You moved like danger but I don't mind
[01:08.58]
[01:09.62]The way you talking' with your eyes
[01:12.59]Your eyes
[01:13.89]
[01:14.39]You leave me broken and I can't lie
[01:18.70]
[01:19.25]It gets me every time and now
[01:23.27]I hear the whispers every night
[01:25.80]Even when I'm dreamin'
[01:28.05]Now tell me baby would you ever mind
[01:31.75]
[01:32.26]I wanna know who's in your head
[01:34.65]
[01:35.20]Stealin' your heart while I'm still bleedin'
[01:37.69]Who's in your bed
[01:39.36]
[01:39.95]Wrapped in your arms while I ain't sleepin'

[01:44.22]Halo
[01:45.14]I just wanna know
[01:47.04]Know who's in your head in your head
[01:50.07]
[01:51.38]I wanna know who's in your head in your head
[01:55.00]
[01:57.28]You get me down
[01:59.11]On my knees
[02:00.16]On my knees yeah
[02:02.05]You drive me wild
[02:03.68]When you want
[02:04.89]When you want it
[02:06.60]Oh you get me down
[02:08.00]
[02:08.64]On my knees
[02:09.63]On my knees yeah
[02:10.93]'Cause every time I look into your eyes
[02:14.54]Look into your eyes
[02:17.75]I wanna know who's in your head
[02:19.77]
[02:20.36]Stealin' your heart while I'm still bleedin'
[02:22.81]Who's in your bed
[02:24.46]
[02:25.10]Wrapped in your arms while I ain't sleepin'
[02:28.05]Got lost in your halo
[02:29.37]Halo
[02:30.28]I just wanna know
[02:32.29]Know who's in your head in your head
[02:35.18]
[02:36.40]I wanna know who's in your head in your head
[02:39.99]
[02:43.57]In your head still baby
[02:47.18]
[02:48.57]In your head while you're sleepin'
[02:51.95]
[02:53.16]In your head still baby
[02:56.62]

data.trans:
[ti:Who's In Your Head]
[ar:Jonas Brothers]
[al:Who's In Your Head]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.33]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.63]//
[00:04.79]//
[00:07.93]
[00:12.66]你如魔法一般转瞬即逝 你如时间一般匆匆流逝
[00:16.33]
[00:17.38]你掩饰着你的真心
[00:20.18]
[00:22.05]当你哭泣时 晶莹的泪珠闪闪发光
[00:25.98]
[00:27.04]但是泪水蒙蔽了我的双眼 而现在
[00:31.04]每晚我都能听到轻声低语
[00:33.52]即使我置身于梦境之中
[00:35.29]
[00:35.86]宝贝 请告诉我 你是否介意
[00:40.18]我想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[00:42.39]
[00:42.98]当我依然痛苦不堪时 偷走你的心
[00:45.47]谁与你同枕而眠
[00:47.13]
[00:47.79]当我辗转反侧 无法入睡时 依偎在你的怀抱里
[00:50.56]沉迷于你的光环之中
[00:51.99]光环
[00:52.89]我只想知道
[00:54.87]只想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[00:57.77]
[00:59.08]我想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[01:02.44]
[01:04.99]你如威胁一般悄然移动 但是我并不介意
[01:08.58]
[01:09.62]你说话时流露出的眼神
[01:12.59]你的眼神
[01:13.89]
[01:14.39]你让我伤心欲绝 我无法说谎
[01:18.70]
[01:19.25]每次都让我伤心 而现在
[01:23.27]每晚我都能听到轻声低语
[01:25.80]即使我置身于梦境之中
[01:28.05]宝贝 请告诉我 你是否介意
[01:31.75]
[01:32.26]我想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[01:34.65]
[01:35.20]当我依然痛苦不堪时 偷走你的心
[01:37.69]谁与你同枕而眠
[01:39.36]
[01:39.95]当我辗转反侧 无法入睡时 依偎在你的怀抱里
[01:42.78]沉迷于你的光环之中
[01:44.22]光环
[01:45.14]我只想知道
[01:47.04]只想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[01:50.07]
[01:51.38]我想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[01:55.00]
[01:57.28]你让我低声下气
[01:59.11]双膝跪地
[02:00.16]双膝跪地
[02:02.05]当你充满渴望时
[02:03.68]你让我疯狂
[02:04.89]你何时会志在必得
[02:06.60]你让我低声下气
[02:08.00]
[02:08.64]双膝跪地
[02:09.63]双膝跪地
[02:10.93]因为每当我凝视着你的双眸
[02:14.54]凝视着你的双眸
[02:17.75]我想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[02:19.77]
[02:20.36]当我依然痛苦不堪时 偷走你的心
[02:22.81]谁与你同枕而眠
[02:24.46]
[02:25.10]当我辗转反侧 无法入睡时 依偎在你的怀抱里
[02:28.05]沉迷于你的光环之中
[02:29.37]光环
[02:30.28]我只想知道
[02:32.29]只想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[02:35.18]
[02:36.40]我想知道谁让你魂牵梦萦
[02:39.99]
[02:43.57]依然萦绕在你的脑海里 宝贝
[02:47.18]
[02:48.57]当你酣睡时 萦绕在你的脑海里
